Factsheet

Developer:
lucemCD
Based in Chengdu，China
Release date:
TBD

Steam
Website:
store.steampowered.com/app/2753950/PlatinumS
Regular Price:
TBD

Description

PlatinumS is a roguelite top-down arena shooter where allow player select heros to build a combat squard and battle with dungeon monsters. Players can choose variouse items and buffs to create unique builds and survive till end of the dungeon.

History

PlatinumS start development at 2023.

Features

  • Retro RPG style queue movement
  • Automatically shooting when close to enemy
  • Defeat enemies and collect drop coins to buy items and heros
  • up to 6 heros build a fancy battle squard
  • Gain exp to upgrade your heros
  • Short sessions, 20 - 50 secs for each wave
  • 15+ different style heros in demo version
  • 40+ items in demo version
